title: Never miss a turn
description: As soon as you start the walk or hike, you will see which directions to take to get to the destination without problems. Get step-by-step voice directions so you can easily put your phone or tablet away and enjoy the view to the fullest.

title: Offline mode
description: Always know where you are, even when you are not connected to the internet. Using offline navigation will also help with the battery life of your phone or tablet.

title: Find campsites
description: If you feel like you need a break, or want to call it a day and get some sleep, you can find possible campsites on the map.
